title: Infernal Nasus is bugged
body:
Infernal {{champion:75}}  laugh is broken. You can hear the original voice line with the Ifnernal too. It is disturbing :/ . Is it fixable ?
(sry for bad english but i try my best )

replies.body: Your English is better than most native speakers.

Hey PokaHUN! 

Thanks for the report! Yup, this is something we'll be able to fix. Lemme sync up with the team who'd be able to get this fixed! :)
Can we hot fix it alrady ? :/ It is still in the game :/
Unfortunately, this isn't something we would hotfix, as it isn't gameplay impacting. The team is currently taking a look at it, though.
Okay ty for the info :) . I tought it got forgoten but now it's all K =3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=BYp7EOh8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-01T22:45:53.445+0000)
>
> Hey PokaHUN! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! Yup, this is something we'll be able to fix. Lemme sync up with the team who'd be able to get this fixed! :)

Katey :D,

My apologies for replying to a post unrelated to a bug, but it is related to Nasus gameplay. 

I ran a search for a Riot team member that recently responded to a Nasus issue. 

About once every couple months, I make a thread that relates to the inability of {{champion:75}} to stack {{champion:41}} barrels and inhibitors. He can stack everything on the map but those two things.

It gets down voted immediately by the community and off the front page within hours. 

Maybe a Riot staff members has seen these threads and has already issued a past response, but I was wondering if this is intentional or a bug?

I have never received an official response in any of my past threads and as a {{champion:75}} player I feel like this is a thematic game-play consistency issue or it is a bug.

Can this be fixed or is it intentional? Is it a coding issue?

Thank you for your time!
